definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
black hat (worn by feudal official)/fig. official post
gauze hat/(fig.) job as an official
lit. to lose one's black hat/to be sacked from an official post

sentences.english: The air-jet yarn strength of these three kinds material has attained the anticipatory aim.
sentences.chinese: 上述三种原料喷气纱的单纱强度均达到了预期的目标。

sentences.english: Her dress had got a fine lace train.
sentences.chinese: 她的礼服上有精美的纱拖裙。

sentences.english: There are two kinds of Air-Jet Texturing method, with or without heat-setting.
sentences.chinese: 空气变形纱加工以是否带有定型热箱分为两大类。

sentences.english: The ribbed crochet raises up peaks and valleys in the yarn.
sentences.chinese: 肋手钩纱提出在波峰和波谷。

sentences.english: The Mechanical properties of glass fiber filament yarn are presented in this paper, especially the stress-relaxation property and the fatigue property under a cyclic load.
sentences.chinese: 本文对玻璃纤维长丝纱的机械性能做了较全面的讨论。

sentences.english: Four-ply yarn construction offers a heavier weight for easy insulation.
sentences.chinese: 四股纱建设提供了一个方便绝缘的重量较重。

sentences.english: Trademark an fiber or the lightweight crease resistant fabric made with Orlon yarns .
sentences.chinese: 用晴纶纱制造的重量很轻的抗褶皱的纤维。

sentences.english: "I call it a spa for yarn, " explains Mr.
sentences.chinese: “我叫它‘纱之温泉’”巴贝拉解释道。

sentences.english: Since the fighting hundreds of spot color clothes, cut a piece of yarn pro-black hat.
sentences.chinese: 斑衣自斗百家彩，乌帽亲裁一幅纱。

sentences.english: The windows are made of glass and there is no need to use paper or linens anymore.
sentences.chinese: 窗子改成玻璃的，也用不着再糊上纸或纱。

sentences.english: Yarn is a general term for long pieces of interlocked fibers.
sentences.chinese: 纱是互锁纤维长幅的总称。

sentences.english: The windows were covered with (screens) to keep out insects.
sentences.chinese: 窗户上盖了一层纱用来防昆虫。

sentences.english: The market trends of BCF are described.
Beads of water cling to its screen, necklaces unstrung.
sentences.chinese: 水珠粘附在后门的纱屏上，就像松开了的项链珠子。

definition: umber-black dye for painting the eyebrow
garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves
